https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Intimate documentary portrait which chronicles the lives of Donald and Luba Boyd, the parents of the director and the grandparents of his 22 year old daughter and co-cinematographer Kate who accompanies him on his personal quest through the countries that Donald and Luba had lived out their failed marriage. Donald And Luba
